      • showColumns

        public static void showColumns(com.haulmont.cuba.gui.components.Table table,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> editableColumns,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ColumnGenerator> generators,
                               java.lang.Boolean viewOnly)
        Prepare table to show specified columns and mark some of them as editable with saving grouping and sorting feature
        Parameters:
        table - UI table to prepare
        columns - all showing table columns
        editableColumns - editable table columns
        generators - custom column generators for showing the columns
        viewOnly - is table showing for view only or not

      • createTsWithoutTime

        Correct CreateTS column in table to show it without the time part
        Parameters:
        table - UI table with CreateTS column

      • performWorkflowAction

        public static void performWorkflowAction(@Nullable
                                         WorkflowEntity entity,
                                         java.lang.Object target,
                                         @Nullable
                                         WorkflowInstanceTask task,
                                         @Nullable
                                         WorkflowInstance instance,
                                         @Nullable
                                         Stage stage,
                                         com.haulmont.cuba.gui.components.Frame screen,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Default workflow execution action

        Usage:

        import com.groupstp.workflowstp.web.util.WebUiHelper; import com.groupstp.workflowstp.web.util.MapHelper;

        Map params = MapHelper.asMap("solved", "true");//setup all WebUiHelper.performWorkflowAction(entity, target, workflowInstanceTask, workflowInstance, stage, screen, params);

        Parameters:
        entity - editor screen entity
        target - target actions UI component
        task - editor screen task
        instance - editor screen workflow instance
        stage - browser screen stage
        screen - UI calling frame
        params - processing parameters

      • performWorkflowAction

        public static void performWorkflowAction(@Nullable
                                         WorkflowEntity entity,
                                         java.lang.Object target,
                                         @Nullable
                                         WorkflowInstanceTask task,
                                         @Nullable
                                         WorkflowInstance instance,
                                         @Nullable
                                         Stage stage,
                                         com.haulmont.cuba.gui.components.Frame screen,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                         @Nullable
                                         java.util.function.Predicate<WorkflowEntity> predicate)
        Default workflow execution action with predicate which can filter processing items
        Parameters:
        entity - editor screen entity
        target - target actions UI component
        task - editor screen task
        instance - editor screen workflow instance
        stage - browser screen stage
        screen - UI calling frame
        params - processing parameters
        predicate - special entities filtering predicate

      • performDoubleWorkflowAction

        public static void performDoubleWorkflowAction(@Nullable
                                               WorkflowEntity entity,
                                               java.lang.Object target,
                                               @Nullable
                                               WorkflowInstanceTask task,
                                               @Nullable
                                               WorkflowInstance instance,
                                               @Nullable
                                               Stage stage,
                                               com.haulmont.cuba.gui.components.Frame screen,
                                               java.lang.String key,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Cumulative workflow action perming

        Usage:

        import com.groupstp.workflowstp.web.util.WebUiHelper; import com.groupstp.workflowstp.web.util.MapHelper;

        Map params = MapHelper.asMap("one", "true"); WebUiHelper.get().performDoubleWorkflowAction(entity, target, workflowInstanceTask, workflowInstance, stage, screen, "ctx_key", params);

        Parameters:
        entity - editor screen entity
        target - target actions UI component
        task - editor screen task
        instance - editro screen workflow instance
        stage - browser screen stage
        screen - UI calling frame
        key - cumulative context property key
        params - processing parameters

      • isDoubleWorkflowActionPerformable

        public static boolean isDoubleWorkflowActionPerformable(java.lang.Object target,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        WorkflowInstance instance,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        WorkflowInstanceTask task,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        Stage stage,
                                                        java.lang.String key)
        Checkup of performing double cumulative action

        Usage:

        import com.groupstp.workflowstp.web.util.WebUiHelper;

        return WebUiHelper.isDoubleWorkflowActionPerformable(target, workflowInstance, workflowInstanceTask, stage, "ctx_key");

        Parameters:
        target - target actions UI component
        instance - workflow instance reference
        task - current performing workflow instance task
        key - cumulative context property key
        stage - processing stage
        Returns:
        answer which should be used in "isPermit" actions method
